ValidationRule.description: Nokia Id field can accept number ony
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( (Profile.Name=='Customers' || Profile.Name=='Customers Login' || Profile.Name=='PRM Partner Community User Login' ||Profile.Name == 'PRM Partner Relationship Manager Login' ||Profile.Name== 'Marketo Sync' || Profile.Name== 'Integration API Only Profile' || Profile.Name=='Excel Add-In Profile' ||Profile.Name== 'Data Loader Profile') , false, ISNUMBER( Nokia_ID__c ) = FALSE)
